entry.title: Mailing List Future
entry.summary:
The recent deliberation among programmers has led to a tentative decision to experiment with using delvingbitcoin.org as a potential platform for our discussions, especially concerning machine learning hosting options. This trial period is set for two weeks, after which the team will re-evaluate its efficacy and decide on whether to continue with it, explore the possibility of hosting our own discourse, or revert to the original mailing list approach.
There seems to be an interest in a feature known as "mailing list mode," which would allow users to interact with the platform through email. However, AJ has pointed out that this feature may not function reliably, and it appears to be currently disabled on delvingbitcoin.org. An effort has been made to enable this mode so that it can be tested during the trial phase, but its functionality remains uncertain, with the limitation that posts cannot be made via email unless this mode is activated.
Further discussion touched upon the organizational aspects of the platform, debating the use of categories versus tags to facilitate discussions. The specific topic of creating a 'Lightning Protocol Design' category was raised, with further details available at the provided link.
Feedback from those who have already formed opinions on these matters is encouraged and will be brought up in the upcoming meeting scheduled post the two-week trial. The conversation demonstrates an openness to exploring different communication tools to enhance collaboration and efficiency within the programming community.
